entry.title: The Bitcoin of data? Sounds intriguing 🤔
entry.summary:
The Bitcoin of data? Sounds intriguing 🤔
Jamiebones: #30daysoftext Day 15 Explain a decentralized storage protocol Arweave: Decentralized Storage for the Permanent Web Imagine a storage system for your data that's not controlled by any single company or government. That's the promise of decentralized storage protocols like Arweave

entry.title: So many years, and React is still going strong!
entry.summary:
So many years, and React is still going strong!
Patrick Skinner (🧱, 🚀): 🚀 React & Decentralized Frontend Hosting: A Perfect Combo for dApps 🚀 The beginning of a bright future where all dApps are on chain from front to back. #30daysoftext @reactjs @ReactJSNews @ReactJSTrends https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1736783547250233516

❤️❤️❤️❤️
Patrick Skinner (🧱, 🚀): This one gets personal... @developer_dao isn't just my favorite DAO. It is: - My Web3 Home. - Where I go to succeed. - Where I go to fail. - Where I go for help. - Where I go to lift others up. - Where I truly believe in "WAGMI." #30daysoftext
